text: Silver Garden at HortPark is one of the best highlights of this peaceful green space in Alexandra. Known for its striking silver, grey, and pale-green foliage, it offers a visually refreshing experience. A notable feature is the polished metal artwork displayed among the greenery, adding a modern, artistic contrast to the garden’s natural surroundings. A great spot for a leisurely stroll or photography—definitely worth visiting when exploring HortPark.
Nice garden inside Hort Park. Interesting plants and flowers to see. Good to see the greenery in the middle of huge buildings
Amazing walk in the beautiful place
Nice, serene gardens... Calm atmosphere... Today wasn't crowded at all.
